description: Succulent lobster, juicy tiger prawns and Pacific oysters make a show-stopping platter with fresh mango salsa and spicy horseradish mayo.
keywords: Seafood Platter With Mango Salsa & Horseradish Mayo
name: Seafood Platter With Mango Salsa & Horseradish Mayo Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Place a tea towel over back of large, sharp knife, then place blade along middle of lobster and press down to cut in half lengthways. Place ice on a large platter. Arrange mayo, salsa, lobster, prawns and oysters on platter. Serve with lime wedges and extra mint leaves.
